titles.title: To amend title 5, United States Code, to allow Federal agencies to reimburse their employees for certain adoption expenses.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Government Reform and Oversight.

bill.summary: 10/10/1998--Introduced. Authorizes the head of each executive agency, the U.S. Postal Service, the Postal Rate Commission, and the Director of the Administrative Office of the U.S. Courts to carry out a program under which an agency employee may be reimbursed for up to $2,000 of qualifying adoption expenses.
